text:
Hmm~, what should I do...!
I need to lighten my load too...

I'm planning to go on a picnic during the next day
off, but I'm debating whether to bring rain gear...

If that's the case, how about asking
a teru teru bozu for help?

Hehe, that's a good idea!
If we ask earnestly, it'll surely be 0% chance of rain!

It would be troublesome if we got
caught in a sudden rain and caught a cold.

Yes, you're right. There seem to be lightweight
rain gears available nowadays, so I'll look into it.

It might be optimistic, but...
wouldn't troubles be more enjoyable with friends?

That's true... it sounds fun to take shelter
from the rain together with everyone.
